title: Israelgogo
author: Israelgogo
content: I know these period many people has lost enough money base on the deepening of bitcoin, most people have feel disappointed or discouraged but only the brave investors will always see far the opportunity BTC brings in future,Now the advantage involved in repositioning yourself to enjoy it movement matters most, assuming you've extra cash to spare out during this falling, in no time the price skyrocks and you be able to cover up the formal lost. Buying now can be pretty cool for the future, bitcoin will never loss it value just time frame and patient to navigate the market

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: I agree with you that buying now is a good thing to do and it can become profitable. But I will prefer to advice people to DCA instead of buying at once. I advice some people to DCA in a a way that if bitcoin fall to a price, that they should buy more. They have been doing it since bitcoin fall to $90000. It is something that has been set on the exchange as limit order. DCA is a good thing to do.

comments.author: GideonGono
comments.body: The market crash is always an opportunity for us to buy crypto at a low price, most traders take advantage of this moment to fill up their bags with a good amount of crypto.But we should also consider how much could we invest without affecting our daily lives.Don't expect that it would just miraculous go up after we bought some, we should have strong hands to endure it if it continues to fall and wait patiently for it to rise up again.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Israelgogo on March 11, 2025, 12:11:34 PMassuming you've extra cash to spare out during this falling, in no time the price skyrocks and you be able to cover up the formal lost. This is what many should do right now instead of panicking. They're only looking at the drops but not with the opportunity that it's showing in front of them.Quote from: Israelgogo on March 11, 2025, 12:11:34 PMBuying now can be pretty cool for the future, bitcoin will never loss it value just time frame and patient to navigate the marketThe price of it changes from time to time but it's value, we all know that it's getting more valuable every year that passes by. The price that's being projected now is quite low compared to the ATH that we've past. And people are looking at that but imagine how high it will be once this uncertainty that we're experiencing is done.

comments.author: apogio
comments.body: Any major (or minor) drop is a good time to buy more of your favorite assets.Just like buying more olive oil, or deodorants when they 're at a discount.You could consider adding a "Not Financial Advice" banner, because you never know...

comments.author: john_egbert
comments.body: A sale is a sale no matter the time.And we need to grab it by its tail.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Maybe for those who are disappointed that short-term traders will be frustrated to see the market that continues to be high volatility to see such rapid market movements, but for long-term investors with the DCA method it is so worrying that they will continue to run DCA purchases at high and low prices.Especially when the price is low now they will buy more sats every week.

comments.body: Still better if Bitcoin keep surging.Even Bitcoin price become more expensive and we only own some satoshis, but we can sell at anytime because no matter how much we bought, we will sell in profit.Since I don't have any money anymore to buy Bitcoin at the dip, for me the current failing isn't an advantage for me.

comments.body: Quote from: Israelgogo on March 11, 2025, 12:11:34 PMI know these period many people has lost enough money base on the deepening of bitcoin, most people have feel disappointed or discouraged but only the brave investors will always see far the opportunity BTC brings in future,Now the advantage involved in repositioning yourself to enjoy it movement matters most, assuming you've extra cash to spare out during this falling, in no time the price skyrocks and you be able to cover up the formal lost. Buying now can be pretty cool for the future, bitcoin will never loss it value just time frame and patient to navigate the marketShort term investors or traders are the ones that would be worried about the drop in the price of Bitcoin. However skilful traders know how the market works, hence no cause for alarm. Newbies and ignorant investors might also be perturbed by the fall in price. But long term investors have patience and courage that the FUD around would not force them to sell off. Bitcoin price is affected by the global economic conditions that is responding to tarriff wars. Hopefully the price will increase when this trade war settles. Buying now is not a bad idea but I wouldn't advice any newbie to target short term profits.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Weak hands would not want to hear that, lol, they only want to make money, as for corrections, dips or crash, count them out. Anyone who has been involved with BTC long enough knows that it has never been a one way trajectory, there would be corrections like this along the line and i noticed that it is usually the weak hands who cannot handle it and they panic-sell, causing even further dump. It is better to view this scenario as an opportunity to accumulate, rather than selling.

comments.author: Gozie51
comments.body: It is not in doubt that buying btc at a low price is better to maximize profit but who knows at what point that the price might stop falling and then start rising for the profit taking, because even at the moment that it is within the $70k area, it might still be a falling knife and when you enter now might be early. However, just like people who still feel that the bull has not been exhausted, I'm still of the view but the price has really gone down that it is suppose to start correction upwards.

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Its only an advantage if you know how to trade like selling when its surging and then before it dumps again you already have sold for stablecoin in order to buy before surging again.The ones who don't do these especially the newbies only plan to hold for long term and its going to be discouraging. Once they know how to do this I guess they can see the advantage of this bear market. Going to futures market is way better if they get better with trading.

I definitely agree with your statement.As someone who started in this forum way back in 2017, these price drops of BTC are nothing but normal occurrences in the cryptocurrency world. In fact, this should be treated as an opportunity for people who are planning to make an investment by acquiring and purchasing BTCs during this price point.Personally, I really and deeply regret selling my BTCs as I failed to HODL majority of all that I have earned in the past 5-6 years. Nevertheless, every opportunity should be taken advantage of, and I submit that this price drop is an experience that everyone should consider investing.
